Series.Actors: |William H. Macy|Emmy Rossum|Justin Chatwin|Stephanie Fantauzzi|Emma Greenwell|Laura Wiggins|Steve Howey|Shanola Hampton|Ethan Cutkosky|Emma Kenney|Cameron Monaghan|Jeremy Allen White|Joan Cusack|
Series.Overview: The series follows the dysfunctional family of Frank Gallagher, a single father of six children. While he spends his days drunk, his kids learn to take care of themselves.
